Privacy

My privacy policy is simple. I like to keep things clear and straightforward. I will never ever sell your personal information, share your contact information with a third party, match you with freelancers, sell or reuse your assets, showcase your deliverables, use your name in a sales pitch, contact you during inappropriate times.
